ContentDeletionMsg: Are you sure you want to delete this content?
ContentNotDeleted: Sorry, the content could not be deleted. Please try again later.
HighlightSuccess: Your content has been successfully highlighted.
HighlightFailure: Sorry, the content could not be highlighted. Pelase try again later.
UnhighlightFailure: Sorry, the content could not be unhighlighted. Please try again later.
HideHighlightFailure: Sorry, the highlight could not be hidden. Please try again later.
HideHighlightConfirmationTitle: Are you sure you want to hide this highlighted content?
HideHighlightConfirmationModalMsg: Once the highlighted content is hidden you won't be able to see it as highlighted but you can still find it in the feed.
ForwardMultiplePageWikiSuccess: Your content forward has started successfully. Once completed, you will be informed through a notification.
ForwardFailure: Sorry, the content could not be forwarded. Please try again later.
InfoMessageAboutForwardFeatureInCommunit: Forwarding this content will duplicate it to the selected community
InfoMessageAboutForwardFeatureWithConver: Forwarding this content will duplicate it to the selected destination
AlertPrivatePageForwarded: You are forwarding a private page. Once forwarded it will be visible to all the members of the targeted community.
AlertPrivatePageSelected: You have selected a private page. Once forwarded it will be visible to all the members of the targeted community.
